text: Va padaru modaraşro ʙar taxt nişond va [hamagī] ʙarojaş ʙa saçda aftodand va [Jusuf] guft: «Padarçon, in ta'ʙir [-i hamon] xoʙam ast, ki peştar dida ʙudam. Parvardigoram onro rost gardonid [va tahaqquq ʙaxşid]. Jaqinan, Ū ʙa man nekī kard, ki maro az zindon ʙerun ovard va pas az on ki şajton mijoni manu ʙarodaronam fitna ʙarpo kard, şumoro az ʙijoʙon [-i Kan'on ʙa Misr] ovard. Be tardid, Parvardigoram dar on ci mexohad, ʙorikʙin ast. Ba rostī, ki Ū donoi hakim ast
